title: LSD recruiting Gold 1 + Players for ranked 5's.
body:
Currently have a duo bot lane with extensive ranked 5's experience at a high level looking for a mid/top/jungle.

Players must be team orientated and goal driven, Skype and mics are a must have and the ability to listen to shot calling. Our team will coalesce and play as one unit.

**Preferred champions**

**Top preferred champions
**
Shen, Maoki, Liss, Lulu, Kennen, Cho, Gnar, Malph
**Mid preferred champions**
Ori, Ziggs, Liss, Cass, Azir
**Jung preferred champions**
Sej, Grag, Vi, Lee, Trundle, Amumu

Our goal is to play around diamond level and commit to playing a schedule of around 2 or so times a week playing 3-5 hours.

Add 'Hubris' IGN for more info or comment here.

replies.body: Colour shade. Plat 1 mid Laner can play all the middle lancers mentioned to a decent stabdard or ablve

R3demption - Plat 3 S3 , Inactive S4, Occasional S5 Gold 1 atm, Just bored mainly playing around with friends in normals and arams, not playing ranked unless its serious 5's team play. or with a decent duo, exceptional support player but can play ADC aswell, Average top and mid, decent jungle. pref supp. Most of my friends are Masters + Challengers, Couple diamonds and a few plats and i generally play with them daily. So decision making and plays are my forte'

If you need a G5 Jg I'm in.

I can play all those champs cept trundle and I'm not the best lee sin

Yo would be keen :)

Plat 5, maining jungle and top (still climbing easily).
Out of the pool you've mentioned, I'm a competent lee/grag/vi for jungling, and mao/lulu for top
Also a decent ziggs/cassi mid if needed.

Happy to listen to your shotcalling or can try out in this role myself if wanted
Schedule seems to fit easily so I'm keen :)

Add me in game (Spaghini) if youre like minded
